attributes.additional_details:
The amount of American owned clubs are threatening the very fabric of English football 
Stripping clubs of their history and community spirit in search of more money to feed their ever bulging pockets.
attributes.background:
Ensure a fair and equal rights for every club in the Premier League
Enforce rules equally and fairly, without bias. 
Ensure Money filters down the football pyramid

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623488
